parameters.query:
SELECT
  -- Total de leads hoje = entraram - saÃ­ram
  (
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prof_frederico.leads_nos_grupos
    WHERE DATE(data_entrada) = CURDATE() AND status = 'No Grupo'
  ) -
  (
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prof_frederico.leads_nos_grupos
    WHERE DATE(data_entrada) = CURDATE() AND status = 'Saiu do Grupo'
  ) AS total_leads_hoje,

  -- Total que entraram hoje
  (
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prof_frederico.leads_nos_grupos
    WHERE DATE(data_entrada) = CURDATE() AND status = 'No Grupo'
  ) AS total_entraram_hoje,

  -- Total que saÃ­ram hoje
  (
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prof_frederico.leads_nos_grupos
    WHERE DATE(data_entrada) = CURDATE() AND status = 'Saiu do Grupo'
  ) AS total_sairam_hoje,

  -- Total geral de leads
  (
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prof_frederico.leads_nos_grupos
  ) AS total_leads_geral;

SELECT
  -- Leads com utm_source especÃ­fico
  (
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cadastros
    WHERE DATE(data_cadastro) = CURDATE()
      AND (
        utm_source LIKE '%insta-bio%'
        OR utm_source LIKE '%insta-direct%'
        OR utm_source LIKE '%insta-stories%'
        OR utm_source LIKE '%whatsapp%'
        OR utm_source LIKE '%email%'
        OR utm_source LIKE '%youtube-org%'
        OR utm_source LIKE '%manychat-cap%'
        OR utm_source LIKE '%manychat-live%'
      )
  ) AS total_leads_por_utm_source,

  -- Leads com utm_campaign especÃ­fico
  (
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cadastros
    WHERE DATE(data_cadastro) = CURDATE()
      AND (
        utm_campaign LIKE '%PREV0625-CAPTACAO%'
        OR utm_campaign LIKE '%GADS%'
      )
  ) AS total_leads_por_utm_campaign,

  -- Soma total dos dois filtros
  (
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cadastros
    WHERE DATE(data_cadastro) = CURDATE()
      AND (
        (
          utm_source LIKE '%insta-bio%'
          OR utm_source LIKE '%insta-direct%'
          OR utm_source LIKE '%insta-stories%'
          OR utm_source LIKE '%whatsapp%'
          OR utm_source LIKE '%email%'
          OR utm_source LIKE '%youtube-org%'
          OR utm_source LIKE '%manychat-cap%'
          OR utm_source LIKE '%manychat-live%'
        )
        OR (
          utm_campaign LIKE '%PREV0625-CAPTACAO%'
          OR utm_campaign LIKE '%GADS%'
        )
      )
  ) AS total_leads_somados;
